Print No. 1101B. Engraving: "James Rumsey's Steam Boats, 6th Nov. 1788...John Fitch's Steam Boat, Dec. 1787. See Rittenhouse's Certificate, page 1075...Robt Fulton's Steam Boat, The North River or Cleremont, 1807."
